|brand = Viptela |model = vEdge |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = 1000 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 1 September 2021 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Viptela_vEdge_1000 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = network security platform, SD-WAN Firewall |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Cavium;CN6130; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = MIPS64 |cpu1_type_rev = OCTEON II |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- 600 / 800 MHz / 1 / 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S29GL128S10TF101; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = eMMC |fla2chip = Micron;MTFC8GLDEA-1M WT; |flash2size = 8 GiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SO-DIMM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 4 GiB |ram1chip = Kingston;KVR13LSE9S8/4; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Vitesse;VSC8211;VSC8211XVW; |lan_ports = 9 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2013.07;; |stockos = Linux;3.10.62;-ltsi;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, SFP (GBIC), SDHC Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = 8 |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, RJ-45 console,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery, redundant power, Dual fan, heatsink, metal case |addchip = USB to Basic UART IC;FTDI;FT230X;;1;,,, Multichannel RS-232 Line Driver;TI;MA3232C;;1;,,, CPLD;Altera;EPM2210F324C5N;;1;,,, I2C TPM Device;Renesas;R5H30211;;1;,,, I2C RTC w/SRAM;Microchip;MPC7940N;;1;,,, 2-Port USB 3.0 xHCI Host Controller;TI;TUSB7320;;1;,,, SMBus-Compatible Temperature Sensor;Maxim;MAX6657;;1;,,, 5-Channel Precision Temperature Monitor;Maxim;MAX6699;;1;,,, 512 Kbit serial I2C bus EEPROM;STMicro;M24512-R;;1;,,, Dual Channel Current-Limited Power-Distribution Switch;TI;TPS2062C;;1;,,, 1.8V-3.3V Low-Power Precision CMOS Oscillator;Microchip;DSC1001;;1;,,, Frequency Generator for PCIE USB3 API & SATA;Renesas;ICS9FG104E;;1;,,, Dual N-Channel Logic Level PWM MOSFET;Fairchild;FDS6898A;;3;,,, N-Channel MOSFET Synchronous Buck Regulator Controller;National Semi;LM2743;;2;,,, 5A 20V Integrated Hot Swap FET;TI;TPS2421;;2;,,, Integrated 4A Synchronous Buck Regulator;International Rectifier;IR3842;;1;,,, Integrated 14A Synchronous Buck Regulator;International Rectifier;IR3840A;;2;,,, Octal Buffer or Driver w/ 3-State Output;TI;SN74LVC244A;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = Interface Masters |manuf_model = Niagara 821 |manuf_rev = Rev G |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 2015 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = USA
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Cavium]]'' CN6130 Quad-core [[MIPS64]] (@1GHz) *Memory: 4GB ECC DDR3 SODIMM *Storage: 16MB SPI Flash, 8GB eMMC Flash, SDHC Card Slot *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port, 8x Gigabit [[Property:SFP ports|SFP Ports]] *USB: 2x USB 3.0 ports, 1x USB device port *Power: Dual 12V, 2.5A via barrel
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/routers/sdwan/vedge/hardware/vEdge-routers-hardware-installation-guide/vEdge-routers-hardware-installation-guide_chapter_0100.html Installation Guide] *[https://interfacemasters.com/pdf/appliances/Niagara821-ProductBrief.pdf OEM Datasheet]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|development}} {{OpenWrtNotice|prebuilt}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/cisco/cisco_vedge_1000 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/inbox/toh/cisco/vedge_1000 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = octeon |subtarget = generic |arch = mips64_octeon |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = snapshot |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
